SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.launch

Class LanguageSelectionFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.launch.LanguageSelectionFXMLController
@Component public class LanguageSelectionFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for selecting the application's language.

This view displays a dropdown list of available languages and provides a button to confirm the language selection, updating the application's locale.

  • Constructor Details

    • LanguageSelectionFXMLController

      public LanguageSelectionFXMLController(MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, TranslationService translationService)
      Constructs a new `LanguageSelectionFXMLController` for selecting the application's language.
      Parameters:
      stage - the main stage of the application
      fxmlFileLoader - utility for loading the FXML file associated with this view
      translationService - the service used for managing translations and available locales

  • Method Details

    • initWithParams

      public void initWithParams(Object... params)
      Initializes the view with parameters, setting up the available languages in the ComboBox. Configures event handling for language selection and updates translations accordingly.
      Overrides:
      initWithParams in class FXMLController
      Parameters:
      params - Array of parameters for initialization (not used in this implementation).

    • setupLanguageComboBoxCellFactory

      private void setupLanguageComboBoxCellFactory()
      Sets the cell factory for the language ComboBox, configuring each cell to display a language name along with a flag icon. This method utilizes `createLocaleListCell` to define how each language option is rendered in the dropdown list.

    • setupLanguageComboBoxButtonCell

      private void setupLanguageComboBoxButtonCell()
      Sets the button cell for the language ComboBox, defining how the selected language is displayed when the dropdown list is closed. This method configures the button cell to display the language name and flag icon of the currently selected language.

    • setupLanguageComboBoxAction

      private void setupLanguageComboBoxAction()
      Configures the action for the language ComboBox. When a user selects a language from the dropdown list, this method updates the application's locale. It calls `translationService.updateLocale` to apply the selected language, then updates translations in the current stage and controller.

    • createLocaleListCell

      private javafx.scene.control.ListCell<Locale> createLocaleListCell()
      Creates a ListCell that displays the language name and associated flag icon for a given Locale. This method generates a ListCell used in the ComboBox to display each language option with its flag icon and formatted language name. It adjusts the flag icon size based on the current scale factor.
      Returns:
      a ListCell configured to display the language name and flag icon.

    • updateSize

      public void updateSize()
      Updates the size and layout of the components based on the current window size and scale factor. Adjusts fonts and component dimensions to maintain proportionality across different window sizes.
      Overrides:
      updateSize in class FXMLController

    • updateTranslation

      public void updateTranslation()
      Updates the translations of the current view components based on the selected language. Refreshes the text of labels and buttons to match the current locale.
      Overrides:
      updateTranslation in class FXMLController

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Sets the language ComboBox to the currently selected language in the application, ensuring the ComboBox reflects the updated locale.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class FXMLController

    • onConfirmButtonClicked

      private void onConfirmButtonClicked()
      Action handler for the confirm button. Sets the selected language as the application's locale and navigates to the login scene.

    • createFlagIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createFlagIcon(Locale locale)
      Creates an ImageView containing the flag icon for the specified Locale. This method uses the IconUtil class to generate an icon based on the country code from the given Locale. The flag icon is loaded from the resources folder.
      Parameters:
      locale - the Locale object representing the language and country.
      Returns:
      an ImageView containing the flag icon, or an empty ImageView if the icon is not found.

    • initializeIcons

      private void initializeIcons()
      Initializes the icons used in the controller's UI components.

    • updateIcons

      private void updateIcons(double scaleFactor)
      Updates the size of each icon according to the given scale factor.
      Parameters:
      scaleFactor - the scale factor used to adjust the size of each icon.
